entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
